meanings.definition: Relating to an artesian well or aquifer.
meanings.sent1: The artesian water was clean and refreshing.
meanings.sent2: The artesian spring provided water for the entire village.
meanings.sent3: The artesian well seemed to have a magical supply of water.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled up like artesian water from a deep source.
meanings.sent5: The artesian flow of water was like a never-ending fountain of life.

meanings.definition: Characterized by the presence of artesian wells.
meanings.sent1: The artesian landscape was dotted with wells that never ran dry.
meanings.sent2: The artesian region was known for its abundant water sources.
meanings.sent3: The artesian wells in the area made it a paradise for farmers.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like an artesian spring, always flowing with new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The artesian nature of the land made it a haven for wildlife.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the upward flow of water in an artesian well.
meanings.sent1: The artesian pressure pushed the water up to the surface effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The artesian flow in the well was strong and steady.
meanings.sent3: The artesian well seemed to defy gravity with its upward stream.
meanings.sent4: His enthusiasm bubbled up like an artesian well, overflowing with energy.
meanings.sent5: The artesian movement of water in the well was mesmerizing to watch.
